Budite u toku sa novim knjigama!: Stay up to date with new books!
Vaša email adresa je sigurna sa nama: Your email address is safe with us
Koliko često se dodaju nove knjige?: How often are new books added?
Koliko mogu da rezervišem/pozajmim knjig: How many books can I reserve/borrow?
Da li mogu odmah preuzeti rezervisanu kn: Can I pick up the reserved book immediately?
Koliko se vremena čeka za prihvatanje re: How long does it take to accept a reservation?
Koliko ukupno ima knjiga u biblioteci?: How many books are there in total in the library?
Koga mogu kontaktirati za više informaci: Who can I contact for more information?
Knjige se dodaju u bazu čim stignu u rea: Books are added to the database as soon as they arrive in the real school library.
U istom vremenu možete rezervisati/pozaj: At the same time, you can reserve/borrow only one copy of the book.
Morate sačekati da bibliotekar/ka potvrd: You must wait for the librarian to confirm your reservation request. After that you can download your book.
Prosječno svaka rezervacija bude razmotr: On average, every reservation is considered within 24 hours of its submission, except for weekends.
